Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Welcome back, my princess. I've been
waiting for you.
<PAGE>
Tonight we celebrate your birthday.
Come.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Are you enjoying yourself, <MYNAME>?
Impressed? Please, eat your fill.
<PAGE>
Don't let it get cold! Come on, eat!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right, done with the cleaning.
<PAGE>
Well, someone looks happy. I'm glad you
had such a good time.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, my princess, this is tonight's
highlight. Your present.
<PAGE>
I think I know you well enough to pick
the perfect gift! You'd better keep it
safe, you hear? Happy birthday.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
You become prettier and prettier every
year. You're an easy woman to love!
<PAGE>
You'd better stay by my side forever.
You hear me? I love you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>! Welcome back! I've been waiting!
<PAGE>
I prepared something special for you
today! Come and see for yourself!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Since it's your birthday, I did my very
best to get everything right.
<PAGE>
We can't let the food get cold! Let's
eat right away! Enjoy your meal!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I've finished cleaning up.
<PAGE>
I love to see you smile like this. You
look happy, which makes me happy too!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here's your birthday present, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I hope you find it useful. Happy
birthday!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
You can't imagine how happy I am to be
with you. You are my sunshine!
<PAGE>
Thank heavens for the day you were born.
I love you so much, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, my love, welcome home! You look
so lovely today.
<PAGE>
I prepared a delicious dinner for this
special occasion! Come, join me!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I gave it my best shot! What do you
think?
<PAGE>
Well, let's leave the comments for
later! Now it's time to eat.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right, the cleaning is all done!
<PAGE>
Seeing the glow in your eyes while you
were eating made me very happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here, <MYNAME>. Please accept this gift.
I hope you'll have a chance to make use
of it.
<PAGE>
I wish you stay just the way you are
forever, <MYNAME>. Happy birthday!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I wonder, when did I start liking this
day so much...?
<PAGE>
Getting married to you was the best
thing that ever happened to me. I love
you, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. I take it work
went well again today.
<PAGE>
I just finished the preparations of your
birthday banquet. Please, come this way.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today I have pushed my cooking skills to
the limit. Please eat to your heart's
content.
<PAGE>
Shall we begin? Bon appétit!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I apologize for taking so long. I have
finished tidying everything away.
<PAGE>
I noticed you were pleased with your
meal today. I'm so very glad.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy birthday to you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I have a special surprise for you.
Please accept this gift.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Let's celebrate this day together for
many years to come!
<PAGE>
I love you from the bottom of my heart,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Welcome back, <MYNAME>. You worked hard
today.
<PAGE>
I made something special for your
birthday. Look, come and see.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I put a lot of effort into making all
this stuff. I hope it tastes okay...
<PAGE>
So, let's eat. Enjoy!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm done with the dishes.
<PAGE>
Judging by the look on your face, I'd
say you're pretty happy. I'm kinda
relieved.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here, <MYNAME>, I got you a birthday
present. I hope you'll use it from time
to time.
<PAGE>
Happy birthday. Thanks for everything
you always do for me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
You always take such good care of me...
I'm really sorry for all the trouble.
<PAGE>
I know how hard you work, and I'm really
grateful to you for that, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Welcome home, my dear <MYNAME>. You worked
late today.
<PAGE>
Tonight I have prepared a special treat
to celebrate your birthday. Come with
me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Does it please you, <MYNAME>? I tried to
arrange everything to your liking...
have I succeeded?
<PAGE>
Please tell me what you think after
we finish our meal. Shall we?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The dishes are all tided away.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I couldn't help but notice your
joyful smile. All my work has paid off.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, my love, happy birthday! I
thought you would like this gift. I'd
love to see you using it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
I am truly thankful for your support.
<PAGE>
I promise I'll take care of you, so
please stay by my side forever. <MYNAME>,
you're the love of my life.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're finally back! I thought
this moment would never come.
<PAGE>
I've put a lot of effort into making you
a delicious birthday dinner, <MYNAME>!
Come here! Let's celebrate together!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So? Are you surprised? Take as much as
you want!
<PAGE>
Let's start eating right away! Enjoy!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sorry to keep you waiting! I finished
all the cleaning!
<PAGE>
So, you say you liked the food? I'm
very happy to hear that!

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
And... you also get this! Ta-da! I hope
you like it!
<PAGE>
Once again, let me wish you a wonderful
birthday, <MYNAME>! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you for making my life so joyful
every day!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I love you! Will you stay with
me forever? Pretty please?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, welcome back! I was waiting
eagerly for you!
<PAGE>
I made a lot of food to celebrate your
birthday, <MYNAME>. Follow me and I'll
show you!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Teehee, what do you think? Of course,
preparing such a feast was simple, for
me!
<PAGE>
Let's eat while it's hot! Bon appétit!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The dishes are sparking clean! 
<PAGE>
Teehee, say what? I made you that happy?
You're such a darling, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here's your birthday present! Today
can't be only about the food, of course!
Take it!
<PAGE>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Thank you for always making me laugh and
accepting me for who I am.
<PAGE>
I'm glad I found such a kind-hearted,
easygoing person as you! I love you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're home.
<PAGE>
I cooked... cooked something to
celebrate your birthday. Please, come.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I thought you'd be hungry, so I made a
lot... I hope you like it.
<PAGE>
Shall we eat, then?

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The cleaning is finished. <MYNAME>, you
seem happy...
<PAGE>
I'm glad you enjoyed it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. Here, your
birthday present... I wonder if you'll
like it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, thank you for always working...
working so hard.
<PAGE>
I'll always treasure your kindness,
<MYNAME>. I love you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, welcome home. I appreciate your
hard work today.
<PAGE>
I was waiting for you, my dear <MYNAME>,
so we could celebrate your birthday
together. Come this way.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I made a lot because your birthday is a
special occasion.
<PAGE>
Let's eat it before it gets cold.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for your patience. I finished
cleaning up the dishes. 
<PAGE>
I didn't think you would be this
happy... I'm delighted to see you
satisfied.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, accept this. I hope this
birthday present will serve you well.
<PAGE>
Once again, happy birthday, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Just by looking at you, I feel happy
and full of energy.
<PAGE>
I love you, <MYNAME>. I always have, and
I always will.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, pumpkin, welcome back!
I was waiting for you! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I've made many delicacies for your
birthday party, <MYNAME>! Come this way.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think I might have gotten a little
carried away. There's a lot of food, so
I hope you're hungry!
<PAGE>
Let's start the feast, muffin!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I'm done with the dishes!
<PAGE>
My, my, don't you look pleased? I love
seeing you look like that! <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here, <MYNAME>, sweetie! Happy birthday!
<PAGE>
It's your birthday present. Please,
take it.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
You're so kind, and handsome, and
hard-working... my adorable prince
charming, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
I couldn't imagine my life without you,
<MYNAME>. I love you forever!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My darling <MYNAME>, welcome home. You're
right on time.
<PAGE>
I just finished preparing your birthday 
celebration, <MYNAME>. Come on, slowpoke!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh ho ho ho ho! You know, when I set my
mind to something, it always comes out
perfect.
<PAGE>
Let's eat quickly. Enjoy!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
My magic helped me clean the dishes. Oh
my, someone looks delighted.
<PAGE>
Well, it's no wonder, since you got to
eat so many wonderful dishes. It was
worth the effort.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here you go, little <MYNAME>. Your
birthday present. You may use it as you
see fit.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Thanks to you, <MYNAME>, every day of my
life is such fun.
<PAGE>
You'll be forever wrapped around my
finger. I hope that's okay with you?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>, happy birthday to you! I love
you, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>, happy birthday to you! I love
you, <PARENT>!

<FACE_SON><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>, happy birthday! Thank you for
everything you do for us! I love you.

<FACE_DAUGHTER><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>, happy birthday! Thank you for
everything you do for us! I love you.

It was the loveliest birthday ever.
Thank you for making it happen!
<SPEED_IMME> Received <GREEN><MOJI0></GREEN>.
